questions.question: What is the primary language for native Android development?
questions.correctAnswer: Kotlin/Java

questions.question: What is the primary language for native iOS development?
questions.correctAnswer: Swift/Objective-C

questions.question: What is a 'hybrid' mobile app?
options: An app built with web technologies that runs in a native container
questions.correctAnswer: An app built with web technologies that runs in a native container

questions.question: Which framework is used for cross-platform development by Facebook?
questions.correctAnswer: React Native

questions.question: Which framework is used for cross-platform development by Google?
questions.correctAnswer: Flutter

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'AndroidManifest.xml' file?
options: It describes essential information about the app to the Android build tools and OS
questions.correctAnswer: It describes essential information about the app to the Android build tools and OS

questions.question: What is an 'Activity' in Android?
options: A single, focused thing that the user can do (usually a single screen)
questions.correctAnswer: A single, focused thing that the user can do (usually a single screen)

questions.question: What is a 'ViewController' in iOS?
options: Manages a view hierarchy for a UIKit app
questions.correctAnswer: Manages a view hierarchy for a UIKit app

questions.question: What is 'APK'?
questions.correctAnswer: Android Package Kit

questions.question: What is 'IPA'?
questions.correctAnswer: iOS App Store Package

questions.question: What is the App Store Review Guidelines?
options: Rules apps must follow to be published on the Apple App Store
questions.correctAnswer: Rules apps must follow to be published on the Apple App Store

questions.question: What is 'dp' in Android?
questions.correctAnswer: Density-independent Pixel

questions.question: What is 'Core Data'?
options: A framework for managing the model layer objects in an application on iOS
questions.correctAnswer: A framework for managing the model layer objects in an application on iOS

questions.question: What is 'Fragment' in Android?
options: A modular section of an activity, which has its own lifecycle
questions.correctAnswer: A modular section of an activity, which has its own lifecycle

questions.question: What is 'Auto Layout'?
options: A constraint-based layout system for iOS
questions.correctAnswer: A constraint-based layout system for iOS

questions.question: What is 'Gradle'?
options: A build automation tool used in Android Studio
questions.correctAnswer: A build automation tool used in Android Studio

questions.question: What is 'SwiftUI'?
options: Apple's declarative framework for building user interfaces
questions.correctAnswer: Apple's declarative framework for building user interfaces

questions.question: What is 'Jetpack Compose'?
options: Android's modern toolkit for building native UI
questions.correctAnswer: Android's modern toolkit for building native UI

questions.question: What is 'CocoaPods'?
options: A dependency manager for Swift and Objective-C projects
questions.correctAnswer: A dependency manager for Swift and Objective-C projects

questions.question: What is 'ANR'?
questions.correctAnswer: Application Not Responding

questions.question: What is 'ARC'?
questions.correctAnswer: Automatic Reference Counting

questions.question: What is a 'Service' in Android?
options: An application component that can perform long-running operations in the background
questions.correctAnswer: An application component that can perform long-running operations in the background

questions.question: What is the 'Keychain'?
options: Secure storage for passwords and certificates in iOS/macOS
questions.correctAnswer: Secure storage for passwords and certificates in iOS/macOS

questions.question: What is 'Intent' in Android?
options: A messaging object you can use to request an action from another app component
questions.correctAnswer: A messaging object you can use to request an action from another app component

questions.question: How to persist data locally in mobile apps?
questions.correctAnswer: SQLite / Core Data / Shared Preferences

questions.question: What is 'Code Signing'?
options: Digitally signing executables to confirm author and guarantee code has not been altered
questions.correctAnswer: Digitally signing executables to confirm author and guarantee code has not been altered

questions.question: What is 'ProGuard' / 'R8'?
options: Tools for code shrinking, obfuscation, and optimization
questions.correctAnswer: Tools for code shrinking, obfuscation, and optimization

questions.question: What is the difference between 'Frame' and 'Bounds' in iOS?
options: Frame is relative to superview, Bounds is relative to its own coordinate system
questions.correctAnswer: Frame is relative to superview, Bounds is relative to its own coordinate system

questions.question: What is 'Deep Linking'?
options: Using a URI to link to a specific location within a mobile app
questions.correctAnswer: Using a URI to link to a specific location within a mobile app

questions.question: What is 'Dependency Injection'?
options: A design pattern in which a class requests dependencies from external sources rather than creating them
questions.correctAnswer: A design pattern in which a class requests dependencies from external sources rather than creating them

questions.question: What is 'MVVM'?
questions.correctAnswer: Model-View-ViewModel architecture

questions.question: What is 'Coroutines' in Kotlin?
options: A design pattern for simplifying code that executes asynchronously
questions.correctAnswer: A design pattern for simplifying code that executes asynchronously

questions.question: What is 'GCD' in iOS?
options: Grand Central Dispatch (low-level API for managing concurrent operations)
questions.correctAnswer: Grand Central Dispatch (low-level API for managing concurrent operations)

questions.question: How does React Native bridge work?
options: It asynchronously serializes messages between JS thread and Native thread
questions.correctAnswer: It asynchronously serializes messages between JS thread and Native thread

questions.question: What is 'Widget' in Flutter?
options: The basic building block of the user interface (Everything is a widget)
questions.correctAnswer: The basic building block of the user interface (Everything is a widget)

questions.question: What is 'KeyStore' in Android?
questions.correctAnswer: Storage system for cryptographic keys

questions.question: What is 'App Thinning'?
options: Apple mechanism to deliver only the parts of the app needed for the specific device
questions.correctAnswer: Apple mechanism to deliver only the parts of the app needed for the specific device

questions.question: What is 'LeakCanary'?
options: A memory leak detection library for Android
questions.correctAnswer: A memory leak detection library for Android

questions.question: What is 'Combine' framework?
options: Apple's framework for processing values over time (Reactive programming)
questions.correctAnswer: Apple's framework for processing values over time (Reactive programming)

questions.question: What is 'TestFlight'?
options: Online service for over-the-air installation and testing of mobile applications
questions.correctAnswer: Online service for over-the-air installation and testing of mobile applications

questions.question: What is 'Proguard' rules?
options: Configuration for code obfuscation and keeping necessary classes
questions.correctAnswer: Configuration for code obfuscation and keeping necessary classes

questions.question: What is 'SceneDelegate'?
options: Manages the life cycle of scenes (windows) in an iOS app
questions.correctAnswer: Manages the life cycle of scenes (windows) in an iOS app

questions.question: What is 'Android Jetpack'?
options: A suite of libraries to help developers follow best practices and write boilerplate code
questions.correctAnswer: A suite of libraries to help developers follow best practices and write boilerplate code

questions.question: What is 'Hot Reload'?
options: Injecting updated source code files into the running Dart Virtual Machine without losing state
questions.correctAnswer: Injecting updated source code files into the running Dart Virtual Machine without losing state

questions.question: What is 'Push Notification'?
options: A message that pops up on a mobile device
questions.correctAnswer: A message that pops up on a mobile device

questions.question: What is 'WebView'?
options: A view that displays web pages inside an app
questions.correctAnswer: A view that displays web pages inside an app

questions.question: What is 'Sideloading'?
options: Installing an app without using the official app store
questions.correctAnswer: Installing an app without using the official app store

questions.question: What is 'Sandboxing'?
options: Restricting an app's access to the system and other apps
questions.correctAnswer: Restricting an app's access to the system and other apps

questions.question: What is 'OOM'?
questions.correctAnswer: Out of Memory

questions.question: What is 'Firebase'?
options: A platform developed by Google for creating mobile and web applications
questions.correctAnswer: A platform developed by Google for creating mobile and web applications
